Name: Bad Note 破碎的笔记
About the game: About the game： 《Bad Note》 is a horror game. The story begins with a strange dream. The protagonist 'Saki' wakes up from a strange dream and feels that he has forgotten a lot of things. The sound of the broken window made her uneasy, whispering in her ear, and the constant humming reminded her of her own situation. Until dawn, the nightmare never stopped..... Ohter： The game has two endings, and several achievements. There are also some eggs. Thank you for play this game.
